dmca.title: Amor Ministries letter
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Katie Gardner [mailto:kgardner@amor.org] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 24, 2007 12:40 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Amor Ministries letter


I've scanned and attached the letter so my signature is on it. Here is
the text of the letter as well:
 

January 23, 2007

Andrea Almeida, Associate General Counsel

1333 Stemmons Freeway

Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

 

Dear Andrea:

This letter is to report a copyright infringement on the Amor Ministries
website. A third party has created a replicated site and claimed it has
Amor Ministries' copyright. The website, including all related pages and
links can be found here: 

http://art315.dodeci.com/abewsey/amor_site/
<http://art315.dodeci.com/abewsey/amor_site/> 

Amor attempted to contact the website host, Dodeci about the copyright
infringement on November 6, 2006. The administrator, David Overholt, did
say it was a student project, but did not respond about taking the
website down. 

The above material is not authorized by Amor Ministries, and we would
appreciate the site taken offline so as to not be confused with our real
website, www.amor.org. The information in this notification is accurate,
and under penalty of perjury, Amor Ministries is authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

 

Sincerely,

Katie Gardner

Marketing Coordinator

Amor Ministries
1664 Precision Park Lane
San Diego, CA 92173
619.662.1200 ext. 122
Katie@amor.org <mailto:Katie@amor.org> 

 

 

 

 
katieGARDNER
AMORministries
619.662.1200 ext.122
amor dot org <http://www.amor.org/>
